item.title: Themes
item.description: Setting up a Theme # First we need to reference the Styles we want to use. <link rel="stylesheet" href="[file path]/kendo.common.min.css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" href="[file path]/kendo.[Theme].min.css" /> Now most of the controls use the [Theme], given in the above Style Resource. item.title: Kendo UI MVVM
item.description: Kendo MVVM is one of the JavaScript MVVM framework. It is the implementation of the MVVM pattern. It create a definition for the data that we want to display and manipulate (the Model), the HTML markup that create structure for overall web page (the View), and the JavaScript code that handles user input, reacts to events, and transforms the static markup into dynamic elements (the View-Model). Kendo MVVM is the JavaScript MVVM framework that implements the MVVM pattern.
